about_the_game: The amateur filmmakers of Devolver Digital present Behind the Schemes, a new take on the traditional behind-the-scenes series. Each episode in the series aims to uncover the spirit of each game through intimate conversations with the personalities behind them and exploring the tiny apartments, humble offices, and vibrant cities where they are made.

#label_about_the_series

The amateur filmmakers of Devolver Digital present Behind the Schemes, a new take on the traditional behind-the-scenes series. Each episode in the series aims to uncover the spirit of each game through intimate conversations with the personalities behind them and exploring the tiny apartments, humble offices, and vibrant cities where they are made.
